page.title: 15Religion
page.content: The church is highly decorated with many bouquets of flowers.The church has many fellowships like housegroups, pathfinders and Sunday meet every Sunday after church service.We do little studying and we find out some things and write on leaflets.On certain Tuesdays it is clubnight.We play games and listen to tapes.The church is hoping to make enough money to build an extension.The extension will be used by the Sunday school people.When the church service is on some people who have children so t hey either take them to Sunday school or leave them in the Narthex with some people who voluntered to look after them while the service is on.The church has a very good choir.At Easter or any other special occasion they sing on the steps infront of the Altar to the congregation.....
